definition: to continue to use (old methods)/to apply as before/according to usage
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: If a new strategy works, then it will be adopted and further routinized as a rule of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 如果新辦法行得通，以後就會沿用而成爲經驗法則。

sentences.english: His policy of overseas contacts was generally followed by his successors in Ming Dyn …
sentences.chinese: 明朝後代基本上沿用了太祖的海外交往政策。

sentences.english: Some names, like 'Night Star' and 'Morning Star', are still used today.
sentences.chinese: 有些船名，就像晚星和晨星仍然沿用到現在。

sentences.english: In the project of building road , calculating the quantity of earthworkapplies approximative formulation.
sentences.chinese: 在築路工程中，土方量的計算一直沿用近似公式。

sentences.english: The production of red pottery still needs the traditional method.
sentences.chinese: 紫砂陶器的生產，仍需沿用傳統的方式。

sentences.english: The chassis beneath the car comes from an Audi RS 5, with its wheelbase shortened and roof lowered.
sentences.chinese: 底盤沿用奧迪RS5，縮短了軸距，削低了車高。

sentences.english: The phrase has been used on his day ever since.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後這句話一直被沿用至今。

sentences.english: The utility model still uses the base structure that a threshing wheel drum and a shed cover are installed on a threshing stirring barrel.
sentences.chinese: 沿用在打穀拌桶上裝打穀輪鼓及棚蓋的基本結構。

sentences.english: The Soviet Union introduced daylight saving in 1981 and it has continued ever since.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯於1981年實施了日光節約時制，並沿用至今。

sentences.english: The word Xie (Chinese equivalent to footwear) was formally adopted as the generic name and continued to the present.
sentences.chinese: 泛指鞋履的名稱正式寫成“鞋”字，一直沿用至今天。

sentences.english: Guan-Li (Amenity of Manhood) customized to the formation in the Zhou Dynasty, has long been in use since then.
sentences.chinese: 冠禮至周代形成定製，此後長期被沿用。

sentences.english: Because I follow a classic pattern, the coding is almost brainless.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我沿用了經典模式，因此編碼幾乎不用動腦子。

sentences.english: In fact, all television equipment today still uses Philo's early idea.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，如今所有的電視機仍然沿用菲羅早期的創意。

sentences.english: Most of the left has followed this confusing usage.
sentences.chinese: 多數左派迄今都是沿用的這個莫名其妙的用法。

sentences.english: This method of manufacture remains the one in use today.
sentences.chinese: 這種鉛筆芯製造法沿用至今。

sentences.english: Since then, the relationship between the number of administrative changes, but the counties were still in use.
sentences.chinese: 此後，行政隸屬關係多有改變，但縣名沿用至今。

definition: to carry on as before/to follow (an old custom etc)
to keep/to retain/to have reservations (about sth)/to hold back (from saying sth)/to put aside for later
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
to convert/to turn into (sth else)/to adapt (a story to another medium)
different broth but the same old medicine (idiom); a change in name only/a change in form but not in substance
